name: Zerocoma
goal: The activity of ZeroComa focuses on the development and commercialization of applications that solve the needs of companies that are obliged to comply with the regulatory framework, not only in Spain but also in the EU.
interests: Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: The policies that ZeroComa considers of greatest interest are those related to electronic invoicing, electronic Administration, digitalization of paper documents to be transformed into electronic support, .. in short, all those iniciatives that lead to the digital transformation of administrative processes by the improvement in productivity, efficiency, reduction of physical file, accuracy of searches and information security. With all this, the improvement of the competitiveness of the European productive sector is achieved, whatever its sector of activity and the size of the organization.
